title: Can I participate in competition that has admission fee but I don't take prize money Assim al hakeem
transcript: is it permissible to participate in a competition with registration fee if they give prize money but if I don't accept the prize money participating in competitions where they have an admission fee the participation itself is gambling whether you take the prize or you collect it and give it for charity or you refuse to take it this does not change a thing and it is not permissible to participate on Allah Knows Best
